questions.question_text: Which of the following OCR (Optical Character Recognition) engines is not free of charge?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
it is B

Selected Answer: B
Answer is B

Selected Answer: B
Answer should be B.
"Local based OCR engine such as MicrosoftOCR, Tesseract or OminPage is free in UiPath environment.
On the other hands, Cloud OCR such as Azure Computer Vision, Google Computer Vision or UiPath Document OCR for digitize purpose basically requires fee except under certain conditions."

questions.question_text: What is the Document Object Model (DOM) in the context of Document Understanding?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
DOM contains the data extracted from the document

choices.C: The DOM is a feature that allows you to convert physical documents into virtual objects that can be manipulated using programming code.
choices.A: The DOM is a JSON object containing information such as name, content type, text length, number of pages, page rotation, detected language, content, and coordinates for the words identified in the file.
choices.B: The DOM is a built-in artificial intelligence system that automatically understands and interprets the content and the type of documents, eliminating the need for manual data extraction.
choices.D: The DOM is a graphical user interface (GUI) tool in UiPath Document Understanding that provides visual representations of documents, making it easier for users to navigate and interact with the content.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
Deep learning is a subset of machine learning that uses multi-layered neural networks.

choices.D:
An area of machine learning concerned with artificial neural networks.
These are a series of algorithms that aim to recognize relationships in a set of data through a process that mimics biological neural networks.
choices.B: The theory and development of computer systems that are able to perform tasks that normally require human intelligence and decision making.
choices.C: A field of artificial intelligence that enables computers to gain high-level understanding from digital images or videos. If AI is the brain, then this is the eye that enables the computer to observe and understand. It works the same as the human eye.
choices.A:
A sub-field of artificial intelligence that enables systems to learn from data.
Systems learn from previous experience and information to deduce and predict future information. To do this they use algorithms that learn to perform a specific task without being explicitly programmed.

questions.question_text: What is the definition of Deep Learning?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D is correct. https://docs.uipath.com/ai-center/automation-cloud/latest/user-guide/custom-named-entity-recognition#recommendations

choices.A: Understand sentiment in product reviews, customer surveys, social media posts, and emails.
choices.B: Classify text in resumes, emails, web pages, and other formats.
choices.D: Extract and classify text in emails, letters, web pages, research papers, and call transcripts.
choices.C: Relate customer questions to FAQ documents and automatically pull responses from these documents.

questions.question_text: What can the Custom Named Entity Recognition out-of-the-box model be used for?

What are the mandatory activities to be included in an automation workflow to allow a remote knowledge worker to pick up an action that validates the extracted data in the form of a Document Validation Action?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
correct answer is D

Selected Answer: D
D is correct, 
- Present Validation Station is for attended/local machine.
- Create Document Validation is remote in action center

choices.D: Create Document Validation Action, Wait for Document Validation Action and Resume.
choices.A: Present Validation Station, Wait for Document Validation Action and Resume.
